newsitem.title: JAPAN: MOF says plans to hold T-bill auction on Wednesday.
newsitem.headline: MOF says plans to hold T-bill auction on Wednesday.

text.p: The Finance Ministry is planning to offer Treasury Bills (T-bills) through a price-competitive auction on Wednesday, a ministry official said on Tuesday.
MOF's offer is likely to be for 1.4 trillion yen worth of three-month T-bills, bond traders said.
